text: @WhiteHouse 113,000 DEAD AMERICANS AND COUNTING OF COVID19. 1,000 AMERICANS DIE EVERY SINGLE DAY BECAUSE TRUMP DID TOO LITTLE TOO LATE AND HAS NOW MOVED ON TO THE NEXT DISASTER HE WILL CAUSE. HE USED CHEMICAL WEAPONS, RUBBER BULLETS, AND FLASH GRENADES ON INNOCENT AMERICANS!
